kmnasa: 🔥 Alert of possible fire in {{km}} км of distance (source NASA):

Estas suscrito/a a alertas de fuegos a {: You subscribed to fire alerts to {{km}} км around this area
¿Quieres compartir tu posición o escribi: Do you want to share your location or write the name of the area to be monitored (for example, a town, an address, etc.)? Select one of the options. You need to turn Location on📍 in your mobile if your want to share with us your location
Tell us the position to watch (for example a town, a street, etc). If you are  using a mobile you can share your location clicking in the clip icon
Este es el mapa del lugar al que te subs: This is the map of the place to which you subscribe
¿A que distancia a la redonda quieres re: At what distance around you want to receive notifications?
📍 El fuego está en mi ubiciación: 📍 The fire is in my location
¿Quieres compartir tu ubicación o escrib: Do you want to share your location or write the location of the fire (for example a village, an address, etc.)? Select one of the options. You need to turn Location on 📍 in your mobile if your want to share with us your location
Write location of fire (eg a village, a street, etc.). If you are using a mobile you can share your location clicking in the clip icon:
Este es el mapa del lugar donde crees qu: This is the map of the place where you think there is a fire
Vas a notificar a los vecinos cercanos s: You're going to notify nearby neighbors about this fire. Are you sure?
No olvides llamar al 📞112 si no lo has h: Do not forget to call 📞112 if you have not already done so to notify the emergency services 🚒
Este fuego o uno muy cercano ya ha sido: This fire or a very close one has already been notified by another person previously. Thanks!
